statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, channel FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount, MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products_count FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_products_count >= 3;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT channel, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY channel HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, channel, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date = '2022-03-15' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 500;
SELECT customer_id, channel, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 1002 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2001;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM sales_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM sales_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channels WHERE channel_type='Online';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_city, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_city = 'London' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_city FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, s.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_city = 'Los Angeles' AND p.product_category = 'Electronics';
